121.content:
demona had spent centuries detesting humans, he hated the worthless insects. that is until she discovered a rare ability that only a hand few gargoyles of her bloodline can preform, she can swallow things whole and alive. when she found that she had this ability, there was only one thing she could think of, eating humans.

months have now passed since she began her diet of nothing but the human race and since then she had grown large and fat. she now ways up to 400 pounds most of which was her belly, and she loved it, she loved being so big, she loved how people now became nothing more than food for her, she loved the nights when she hunted them, and tonight was one of those nights.

"mmm" demona moaned, she was famished. she was perched on a building top looking down on her buffet, she didn't know where to start. she looked up at the night sky and saw that it was a full moon just like the night of her first human meal.
121.title: Demona's diet

info.brief_description: the girls from Gargoyles get bigger
info.description:
In this interactive, girls from gargoyles gain weight

Rules:
- females must be the main gainer.
- males may gain weight slightly 20lbs. max
- vore is allowed
- nudity/sex is allowd
- charactor are allowed to gain as much as possible but keep wg in each chapter realistic
